Articles.Content: so every time i boot the ksp it takes more than    20 minutes       to load and this is very annoying anyone having an idea why is this happening plz help me decrease loading times
It happens due the amount of add-ons you have installed. Cut down the add-ons to the very minimum you really need to play.

41 minutes ago, tonimark said:

so every time i boot the ksp it takes more than    20 minutes       to load and this is very annoying anyone having an idea why is this happening plz help me decrease loading times

Most likely what @Lisias said, but we could give you more targeted advice if we could see the log file.  Upload the output_log.txt to a file sharing site and post the link here

Logs, computer specs will help.

Also, try to close all irrelevent tasks in background.
Hmph.. mine regularly takes 15-20 min.... I get worried if it's under 10....

well my system only takes 5 minutes too load and never longer.. I have 30 plus mods and 10k+ patches. 1.4.3 version

windows10, wd sata3 drive's , gen8 i7-8700 16gigs with a 960 card. (ps it worked the same on my gen4-4700 as I just recently upgraded)

maybe I should be worried..holding breath till someone turns blue

FYI

Jammer

ok 60 plus mod's..lol
